name: 招生计划扩展查询模板字典
description: 招生计划分配人员、招生计划班级、招生计划跟踪等招生计划扩展功能相关表的查询模板

招生计划分配人员总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_assignees
招生计划分配人员总数.description: 查询招生计划分配人员总数
招生计划分配人员总数.response: 招生计划分配人员总数为{count}人

分配角色统计.sql: SELECT assignee_role, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_assignees GROUP BY assignee_role ORDER BY count DESC
分配角色统计.description: 统计招生计划分配角色分布

分配状态统计.sql: SELECT assignment_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_assignees GROUP BY assignment_status ORDER BY count DESC
分配状态统计.description: 统计招生计划分配状态分布

活跃分配人员.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_assignees WHERE assignment_status = 'active'
活跃分配人员.description: 查询活跃的招生计划分配人员数量

计划分配统计.sql: SELECT plan_id, COUNT(*) as assignee_count FROM enrollment_plan_assignees GROUP BY plan_id ORDER BY assignee_count DESC
计划分配统计.description: 统计各招生计划的分配人员数量

招生计划班级总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_classes
招生计划班级总数.description: 查询招生计划班级总数
招生计划班级总数.response: 招生计划班级总数为{count}个

班级类型统计.sql: SELECT class_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_classes GROUP BY class_type ORDER BY count DESC
班级类型统计.description: 统计招生计划班级类型分布

班级状态统计.sql: SELECT class_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_classes GROUP BY class_status ORDER BY count DESC
班级状态统计.description: 统计招生计划班级状态分布

可招生班级.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_classes WHERE class_status = 'available'
可招生班级.description: 查询可招生的班级数量

计划班级分布.sql: SELECT plan_id, COUNT(*) as class_count FROM enrollment_plan_classes GROUP BY plan_id ORDER BY class_count DESC
计划班级分布.description: 统计各招生计划的班级数量分布
计划班级分布.response: 计划班级分布统计完成

招生计划跟踪总数.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_trackings
招生计划跟踪总数.description: 查询招生计划跟踪总数
招生计划跟踪总数.response: 招生计划跟踪总数为{count}条

跟踪状态统计.sql: SELECT tracking_status, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_trackings GROUP BY tracking_status ORDER BY count DESC
跟踪状态统计.description: 统计招生计划跟踪状态分布

跟踪类型统计.sql: SELECT tracking_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_trackings GROUP BY tracking_type ORDER BY count DESC
跟踪类型统计.description: 统计招生计划跟踪类型分布

进行中跟踪.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_trackings WHERE tracking_status = 'in_progress'
进行中跟踪.description: 查询进行中的招生计划跟踪数量

本月跟踪记录.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_trackings WHERE YEAR(created_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(created_at) = MONTH(NOW())
本月跟踪记录.description: 查询本月招生计划跟踪记录数量

招生计划扩展概览.sql: SELECT 'enrollment_plan_assignees' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_assignees UNION ALL SELECT 'enrollment_plan_classes' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_classes UNION ALL SELECT 'enrollment_plan_trackings' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM enrollment_plan_trackings
招生计划扩展概览.description: 招生计划扩展功能数据总览
招生计划扩展概览.response: 招生计划扩展概览查询完成
